--------------------
Text: The Battle of Taegu was an engagement between UN and North Korean forces early in the Korean War, with fighting continuing from August 5–20, 1950 around the city of Taegu, South Korea.
Triplets:<The Battle of Taegu
1:
--------------------
Text: Battle of Taegu:  It was a part of the Battle of Pusan Perimeter, and was one of several large engagements fought simultaneously.
